pages.text: $(thing)Horbs$() are a large, yet timid creature found in the $(thing)Forests$() of the $(thing)Misty World$(), with a tendency to flee any human they encounter.$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Horb$() grants 2 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.$(br2)They can be tamed and bred using $(item)Red Mushrooms$() and $(item)Orange Mushrooms$(), requiring $(thing)Taming level 2$().
